BRT.Currency.Label: Monedas:
BRT.CurrencyLootPlaceholder: Agrega fórmulas separadas por comas, p.e.: 1d4[gp], (1d4+1)*10[sp]
BRT.LootActorNamePlaceholder: Si está vació, se creará un nuevo actor de botín cada vez
BRT.Settings.LootSheet.Title: Hoja a usar para el botín generado
BRT.Settings.LootSheet.Description: Puedes seleccionar hojas de PNJ alternativas para ser usadas para los botines generados
BRT.Settings.SpellCompendium.Title: Compendio de conjuros a usar para los pergaminos alteatorios de conjuros
BRT.Settings.SpellCompendium.Description: Puedes especificar un compendio de conjuros y cuando se tome un pergamino de conjuros de una tabla de botín (han de tener un nombre específico) un conjuro aleatorio es elegido de ese compendio
BRT.LootRollAmountPlaceholder: Lanzar por la tabla al completo múltiples veces
BRT.Currency.Buttons.Share.Label: Share
BRT.Currency.Shared.Label: Shared!
BRT.Settings.RerollButtons.Title: Show Reroll buttons
BRT.Settings.RerollButtons.Description: Display a Reroll button on each result card of a roll on a rolltable (only for newly created cards). Work only on loot chat card or if condensed roll output is enabled. Default tables are not affected.
BRT.Settings.OpenButtons.Title: Show Open buttons
BRT.Settings.OpenButtons.Description: Display a open button on each result message of a roll on a rolltable (only for newly created cards). Work only on loot chat card or if condensed roll output is enabled. Default tables are not affected.
BRT.Settings.ShowWarningBeforeReroll.Des: Show a confirm dialog before reroll message content.
BRT.Settings.UseCondensedBetterRoll.Desc: If enabled, this will aggregate same output with a multiplier to save space. This option may speed up rolltable draws. Default tables are not affected.
BRT.Settings.AddRollInRolltableContextMe: Add an option in rolltable's contextmenu to roll table without opening it. Work on all table type.
BRT.Settings.AddRollInCompediumContextMe: Add an option in compendium's contextmenu to roll on this compendium without creating rolltable from it. Work on all non-empty compendiums.
BRT.Settings.RerollWarning.Title: Reroll?
BRT.Settings.RerollWarning.Description: Message content will be lost. Are you sure you want to reroll?
BRT.Settings.StickRolltableHeader.Title: Stick rolltable header to top?
BRT.Settings.StickRolltableHeader.Descri: If enabled, roll table header will no more scroll with content.
BRT.Settings.RollTableFromJournal.Title: Add roll button to tables in journal entries?
BRT.Settings.RollTableFromJournal.Descri: If enabled, a roll button is added to linked tables in journal entries.
BRT.Settings.ShareCurrencyButton.Title: Show share currency button?
BRT.Settings.ShareCurrencyButton.Descrip: Show a button on mesage to share currency (if any) (dnde only)
